name: Summer Camp
description: Unalayee’s mission of providing wilderness summer camp programs for kids from all backgrounds. Summer camp programs learn about themselves as they learn to live in the wilderness. The rugged terrain of the Trinity Alps provides a challenging and dramatic backdrop for outdoor adventure.
fullDescription: Unalayee’s mission of providing wilderness summer camp programs for kids from all backgrounds. Summer camp programs learn about themselves as they learn to live in the wilderness. The rugged terrain of the Trinity Alps provides a challenging and dramatic backdrop for outdoor adventure.

The rugged terrain of the Trinity Alps provides a challenging and dramatic backdrop for outdoor adventure.
address: Scott Mountain Summit, Scott Mountain, CA, 96014
